title: 14 day ban?
body:
so i recently got a 14 day ban for toxic behaviour and yes i have to admit i was being quite toxic. but it wasnt for no reason the duo botlane decided they didnt want to play anymore and wanted to afk in base, they would walk out of base o reset the timer then walk back in. anyway i got really tilted and started flaming them telling him to game end ect. they decided that instead of afking now they would try and stop them from ending and flame me back harder for the remainder of the game. i told everyone to report them for negative attitude and trolling int he lobby and left and within a minute i had a 14 day ban i feel it was unjust but it doesnt matter, ive never been banned never been restricted,
 im just wondering what happens when i get unbanned 
how easy is it to get another 14 day ban or is it imidiatley a perma ban

replies.body: After a 14 day ban, next punishment for verbal infractions is a perm. No matter how trivial it may seem.

it dont matter why you are toxic. 

verbally abuse/flaming/hate speech etc etc is against the rules

you broke them and now are punished.

as far as perma ban from this point well consider yourself on really really thin ice and you are a fat boy trying to cross it. 

basically any infraction that is legit will result in perma ban. 

so my advice to you going forward do not use chat. do not directly speak to another player via chat. 

keep it generic and on topic of game. 

jungle top, lets baron. push mid etc like that.
You get this big warning that says you will be permbanned the next time you break any rule, and have to manually type in something like "i understand"..
What does honour change about reports or getting banned cause my honour just got unlocked

Honor gets reset on restrictions or bans, to my knowledge. Honor level does not change how reports or punishments behave.

After a certain number of "clean" games (not an amount of time, and not a fixed number - it seems to depend on how well you perform and honor gained) hextech and honor rewards are unlocked again.

also a bit more info and questions 
i had a worlds pass what happens witht that is it gone?
the ban was off of 1 game
if the worlds pass stays on my account do i keep my rewards and or missions

Your pass will still be active, but you cannot use it during the 14 day suspension. You do not get any extensions to missions or alternative missions - any missions that are time locked (ex: first win of the day) will simply be unobtainable by you.

Any rewards you were able to get before the ban, or after the ban ends (if applicable) will still be yours.
